title: Cloudsim tests not working on Jenkins

content.raw:
There are three errors:

1. In Test command: "inside/cgi-bin/common/startup_script_builder.py": 'inside/cgi-bin/common/startup_script_builder.py' does not exist

2. In Test command:  "cloudsimd/launchers/cloudsim.py": 
   File "cloudsimd/launchers/cloudsim.py", line 343, in launch
   File "/var/lib/jenkins/jobs/cloudsim-cloudsim_1.2-devel-precise-amd64/workspace/cloudsim/cloudsimd/launchers/launch_utils/sshclient.py", line 63, in upload_file
     raise SshClientException('scp failed: %s'%(output))
    SshClientException: scp failed: /var/www-cloudsim-auth/cloudsim.zip: No such file or directory

3. In Test command: /usr/bin/python "cloudsimd/cloudsimd_test.py":
  can't open file 'cloudsimd/cloudsimd_test.py'

It seems that two of the tests no longer exists and one of them has to be fixed.
content.html:
There are three errors:

  1. In Test command: "inside/cgi-bin/common/startup_script_builder.py": 'inside/cgi-bin/common/startup_script_builder.py' does not exist

  2. In Test command: "cloudsimd/launchers/cloudsim.py": File "cloudsimd/launchers/cloudsim.py", line 343, in launch File "/var/lib/jenkins/jobs/cloudsim-cloudsim_1.2-devel-precise-amd64/workspace/cloudsim/cloudsimd/launchers/launch_utils/sshclient.py", line 63, in upload_file raise SshClientException('scp failed: %s'%(output)) SshClientException: scp failed: /var/www-cloudsim-auth/cloudsim.zip: No such file or directory

  3. In Test command: /usr/bin/python "cloudsimd/cloudsimd_test.py": can't open file 'cloudsimd/cloudsimd_test.py'

It seems that two of the tests no longer exists and one of them has to be fixed.
